title: Ticket #2069: spool directories are created for all submitted jobs
description:
Commit [21191] for #1985 causes all submitted jobs to have a spool directory. This circumvents optimizations in previous releases that only created spool directories when actually needed. The main reason for wanting to optimize this is for HA schedd deployments where the spool is on a shared filesystem that makes spool directory operations fairly expensive.

The schedd previously used the function jobIsSandboxed() to decide whether to create a spool directory for a job or not.
remarks:
2011-Apr-18 17:59:41 by jfrey:
The previous behavior of creating a spool directory only for jobs that require it has been restored.
